description:
Battle your way through multiple, increasingly difficult levels in this Dungeons and Dragons style role-playing game (RPG).

Cave of Epokothar is an RPG in the rogue-like genre, where you adventure into the depths of a dungeon to find and defeat the demon Epokothar. As you progress, you gain levels, skills, and equipment to become more powerful.

Available in English only.

-------------
version 1.0.3 changes:
Performance improvements. Better AI for monsters. Slight UI improvements. Bug fixes.

version 1.0.2 changes:
Added a "follow your finger" feature so your character keeps moving towards your finger while you hold down, instead of requiring you to continually tapping to make him move.

Add a potion of sustenance and fixed a few bugs.
versionNote:
Performance improvements.
Improved pathfinding AI for monsters.
Added a vertical separator between map and stats area.
Several bug fixes
